home.description: Modular Vue components power each section, ready to accept real data via APIs.

about.title: Responsive Design Rules
rules: Base all spatial values on rem units converted from the design draft.
Use the provided PostCSS rule to convert px to rem automatically.
Design layouts mobile-first, then enhance with breakpoint-based media queries.
Leverage the predefined utility classes for spacing and layout consistency.

aboutPage.missionDescription: SEU advances interdisciplinary research, talent cultivation, and cultural inheritance to serve national strategies and global progress.
missionBullets: Integrate moral education with academic excellence to nurture well-rounded talents.
Drive innovation through collaborative research platforms and industry partnerships.
Build an open, inclusive campus that supports global engagement and cultural exchange.
aboutPage.pillarDescription: Three development pillars highlight SEU’s strengths in academics, talent cultivation, and social contribution.

collegesPage.clusterDescription: Multi-disciplinary clusters work together to create an integrated talent pipeline.
collegesPage.platformDescription: Joint labs, research institutes, and international campuses expand learning horizons.
platformBullets: Cross-college innovation studios drive interdisciplinary teaching.
Open laboratories and shared facilities enable hands-on exploration.
Global programs connect students with partners worldwide.

facultyPage.highlightDescription: Comprehensive initiatives support faculty development from globally renowned scholars to rising stars.

educationPage.programDescription: Layered undergraduate, graduate, and professional programs support lifelong learning.

researchPage.platformDescription: State-level laboratories and collaborative centers tackle frontier challenges.

admissionsPage.highlightDescription: Experience a vibrant campus, cutting-edge research, and industry-aligned career support.

libraryPage.collectionDescription: Smart library services connect digital and physical resources for teaching and research.

showcasePage.title: Component Gallery
showcasePage.description: Preview every reusable layout block in isolation. Each widget accepts props and can be hydrated with API data later.
showcasePage.heroDescription: Full-width carousel and hero banner components for storytelling and branding moments.
showcasePage.heroCarouselDescription: Autoplay banner with bullet navigation. Provide an items array containing title, copy, image, and link.
showcasePage.sectionHeroDescription: Single hero card with gradient overlay, ideal for landing sub-sites or campaign pages.
showcasePage.dataDescription: Display institutional metrics or historical milestones via statistic strips and timelines.
showcasePage.statsDarkDescription: Use the dark variant on colorful backgrounds. Pass an array of { value, label }.
showcasePage.statsLightDescription: Default light surface for dashboards or overview cards.
showcasePage.timelineDemoDescription: Chronological milestones rendered with vertical connector and year markers.
showcasePage.newsDescription: Combine featured stories and list feeds. Swap static samples for real CMS content.
showcasePage.newsPrimaryDescription: Highlight story with cover image and supporting list items.
showcasePage.newsDefaultDescription: Component with placeholder data to illustrate the expected structure.
showcasePage.servicesDescription: Mix service shortcuts and event spotlights to surface high-frequency actions.
showcasePage.servicesPrimaryDescription: Icon-based quick links. Each entry accepts title, subtitle, icon, href.
showcasePage.eventsPrimaryDescription: Compact event list with date badge and meta information.
showcasePage.cardsDescription: Showcase topics or initiatives with image overlays and informational cards.
showcasePage.cardGridDescription: Responsive information cards with CTA links for strategic initiatives.
showcasePage.focusGridDescription: Image overlay cards for storytelling or featured campaigns.
showcasePage.contentDescription: Text-image split and stepper components convey detailed narratives and processes.
showcasePage.contentSplitDescription: Balanced text and imagery layout. Supports reversed orientation and CTA links.
showcasePage.stepsDescription: Vertical stepper for processes such as admissions timelines or workflows.
showcasePage.defaultsDescription: All components ship with placeholder data for design review and skeleton screens.
showcasePage.heroDefaultDescription: Demonstrates the built-in placeholder data when no props are provided.
showcasePage.servicesDefaultDescription: Uses default service list to aid design reviews before APIs are ready.
showcasePage.eventsDefaultDescription: Fallback dataset for timelines or loading states.
showcasePage.focusDefaultDescription: Default cards suitable for skeleton previews.
showcasePage.defaultDataNote: Replace with real API data by passing props from your fetching layer.
showcasePage.navDescription: Tabs, breadcrumbs, and filter bars help visitors orient themselves inside complex sections.
showcasePage.tabsDescription: Display category switching with `items` and `v-model` state.
showcasePage.breadcrumbDescription: Show hierarchical navigation plus page headline and sub copy.
showcasePage.filterDescription: Keyword search paired with quick filter chips.
showcasePage.listsDescription: Mix lightweight notice feeds, rich tables, and card-based rosters.
showcasePage.noticeDescription: Simple list for announcements with quick links.
showcasePage.tableDescription: Responsive table for project milestones or statistics.
showcasePage.cardDescription: Avatar-style cards with tags for mentors or teams.
showcasePage.faqDescription: Use accordion, horizontal timelines, and progress steps to explain workflows.
showcasePage.timelineHorizontalDescription: Show multi-step schedules with equal-width milestones.
showcasePage.engageDescription: Drive actions with CTA banners, testimonials, and galleries.
showcasePage.ctaDescription: Large gradient hero with copy and action button.
showcasePage.testimonialDescription: Quote cards for alumni or partners.
showcasePage.galleryDescription: Responsive photo grid for campus highlights.
showcasePage.contactSectionDescription: Provide contact methods, forms, partner logos, and download links.
showcasePage.simpleFormDescription: Minimal form for consultation or event RSVP.
showcasePage.downloadDescription: List downloadable brochures, calendars, or guides.
